description: MainActivity class for the Tic Tac Toe game, extending ReactActivity to integrate React Native with Android.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: Activity that serves as the entry point for the Tic Tac Toe application, managing the React Native lifecycle.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Lifecycle method that is called when the activity is created.

methods.name: getMainComponentName
methods.description: Returns the name of the main component registered from JavaScript.

methods.name: createReactActivityDelegate
methods.description: Creates a delegate to manage the activity's integration with React Native.
